name: Jank Warrior
description:
JANK WARRIOR

A simple arcade game made for the GTMK2019 game jam. The theme was "Only one". Play as a gladiator that must use junk as weapons that break immediately after being used!

Feedback is very welcome!Controls:
  • WASD or Arrow keys: move;
  • Left mouse button: attack, if you have a weapon.
Source code:

This game is open-source, under the MIT license. You can check the source code by clicking here!

Credits:Software used:
  • Engine: Godot Engine 3.1.1;
  • Art: Aseprite;
  • Sound effects: JXFR, Audacity;
  • Music: LMMS.
Roles:
  • Delta-key: Coding, music, design;
  • Sklaiser: Art, design, sound effects, playtesting.
